description: Verify that the User Dashboard page loads correctly when accessing /profile/dashboard with authenticated user
scenario: Logged-in user navigates to their dashboard to view learning progress and cybersecurity achievements
expected_results: Display the complete dashboard with stats overview, progress tracking, skill analysis, and adaptive learning insights
procedure:
1. Login with valid user credentials
2. Navigate to http://localhost:5000/profile/dashboard
3. Verify page loads completely
4. Check page title displays 'Dashboard'
5. Verify welcome message with username
6. Check all dashboard sections are visible and properly styled
7. Verify gradient background and responsive layout

description: Verify the dashboard header displays correctly with welcome message and navigation
scenario: User views the dashboard header with personalized welcome and quick access buttons
expected_results: Display welcome message with username and navigation buttons to levels overview
procedure:
1. Navigate to /profile/dashboard page while logged in
2. Verify 'Welcome back, [username]!' heading is displayed
3. Check subtitle 'Track your cybersecurity learning progress and achievements'
4. Verify responsive text sizing (text-3xl md:text-4xl)
5. Check header uses flex layout for mobile/desktop
6. Verify text colors in light and dark mode
7. Test header animation (animate-fade-in-up)

description: Verify stats overview cards display user progress metrics correctly
scenario: User views four stat cards showing total XP, levels completed, learning streak, and current rank
expected_results: Display four responsive stat cards with proper icons, values, and color schemes
procedure:
1. Navigate to dashboard page
2. Verify four stat cards are displayed in grid layout (grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4)
3. Check Total XP card with blue styling and trophy icon
4. Verify Levels Completed card with green styling and target icon
5. Check Current Streak card with orange styling and fire icon
6. Verify Rank card with purple styling and award icon
7. Test card animations with staggered delays (0.1s, 0.2s, 0.3s, 0.4s)
8. Check responsive layout on mobile devices

description: Verify learning progress section displays overall progress and level completion status
scenario: User views their overall learning progress with completion percentage and level grid
expected_results: Display progress bar with percentage and grid of levels showing completion status
procedure:
1. Navigate to dashboard page
2. Verify 'Learning Progress' section in left column (lg:col-span-2)
3. Check overall progress percentage display
4. Verify progress bar with correct width and styling
5. Check level progress grid (grid-cols-2 sm:grid-cols-5)
6. Verify each level shows completion status (completed/unlocked/locked)
7. Test progress bar animation on page load
8. Check responsive grid layout on different screen sizes

description: Verify quick actions panel provides easy access to next level and navigation
scenario: User views quick actions sidebar with buttons for next level, levels overview, and profile
expected_results: Display quick actions panel with properly styled navigation buttons
procedure:
1. Navigate to dashboard page
2. Verify 'Quick Actions' panel in right column
3. Check 'Continue Next Level' button if next_level exists
4. Verify button links to correct level start URL
5. Check 'View All Levels' button with levels overview link
6. Verify 'View Profile' button with profile page link
7. Test button styling and hover effects
8. Check responsive layout on mobile devices

description: Verify learning recommendations section displays AI-powered suggestions
scenario: User views personalized learning recommendations from adaptive learning system
expected_results: Display learning recommendations with lightbulb icon and recommendation cards
procedure:
1. Navigate to dashboard page with user who has recommendations
2. Verify 'Learning Recommendations' section with lightbulb icon
3. Check recommendation cards with gradient backgrounds
4. Verify each recommendation shows title, description, type, and confidence
5. Test 'Accept' button functionality on recommendations
6. Check empty state message for users without recommendations
7. Verify robot icon and helpful text for empty state
8. Test recommendation interaction with JavaScript

description: Verify skill breakdown section displays user skill analysis and proficiency levels
scenario: User views their skill assessment breakdown with proficiency indicators
expected_results: Display skill breakdown with progress bars and proficiency levels for each skill
procedure:
1. Navigate to dashboard page with user who has skill assessments
2. Verify 'Skill Breakdown' section with graph-up icon
3. Check skill list shows top 6 skills from skill_analysis
4. Verify each skill displays name, proficiency level, and score
5. Check progress bars for skill scores
6. Test empty state for users without skill assessments
7. Verify bar-chart icon and helpful text for empty state
8. Check skill name formatting (replace '_', title case)

description: Verify learning analytics section displays engagement metrics and insights
scenario: User views learning analytics with engagement score, session stats, and preferred time
expected_results: Display learning analytics with metrics grid and personalized insights
procedure:
1. Navigate to dashboard page with user who has learning patterns
2. Verify 'Learning Analytics' section with analytics icon
3. Check engagement score display with circular progress
4. Verify session stats show total sessions count
5. Check preferred time indicator (morning/afternoon/evening learner)
6. Verify analytics insights section if recommendations exist
7. Test metrics grid responsive layout (grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3)
8. Check conditional display based on learning_patterns.status

description: Verify dashboard displays basic user progress metrics using simplified system
scenario: Dashboard displays user progress data using mock data system
expected_results: All dashboard metrics display correctly with simplified data structure
procedure:
1. Navigate to dashboard with user who has completed levels
2. Verify total_xp displays default mock value
3. Check completed_levels shows basic completion status
4. Verify learning_streak shows simplified streak data
5. Check user_rank displays basic rank
6. Verify skill_analysis shows simplified skill data
7. Check progress display is functional
8. Test progress_percentage calculation works

description: Verify level progress grid displays correct status for each cybersecurity level
scenario: User views level grid showing completed, unlocked, and locked levels with proper styling
expected_results: Level grid displays accurate completion and unlock status for all CYBERSECURITY_LEVELS
procedure:
1. Navigate to dashboard page
2. Verify level grid shows all levels from CYBERSECURITY_LEVELS
3. Check completed levels show completion styling
4. Verify unlocked levels are accessible but not completed
5. Check locked levels show locked styling
6. Verify level unlocking logic (first level unlocked, others require previous completion)
7. Test level data includes score, attempts, time_spent, xp_earned
8. Check adaptive difficulty recommendations for available levels

screen_design_ref: Figure 14.11: Blue Team vs Red Team Integration
description: Verify Blue Team vs Red Team mode integration and unlock status
scenario: User views Blue Team vs Red Team progress and unlock requirements
expected_results: Blue Team mode shows proper unlock status and progress data
procedure:
1. Navigate to dashboard with user who has completed first level
2. Check blue_team_unlocked status (should be true after completing first simulation level)
3. Verify blue_team_progress data if user has played Blue Team mode
4. Check Blue Team progress display in dashboard
5. Test with user who hasn't completed first level (should be locked)
6. Verify unlock requirement messaging
7. Check Blue Team navigation if unlocked
8. Test progress data integration with simplified progress system

description: Verify JavaScript dashboard animations work correctly on page load
scenario: User observes smooth progress bar animations when dashboard loads
expected_results: Progress bars animate from 0% to target width with smooth transitions
procedure:
1. Clear browser cache and navigate to dashboard
2. Observe progress bar animations on page load
3. Verify progress bars start at 0% width
4. Check bars animate to correct width after 500ms delay
5. Test animation performance and smoothness
6. Verify dashboard.js loads correctly
7. Check console for any JavaScript errors
8. Test animations work across different browsers

description: Verify dashboard integrates with adaptive learning API endpoints
scenario: Dashboard makes AJAX requests to adaptive learning endpoints for dynamic data
expected_results: Dashboard successfully loads adaptive learning preferences and suggestions via API
procedure:
1. Navigate to dashboard page
2. Open browser developer tools Network tab
3. Verify AJAX requests to /api/adaptive/preferences
4. Check requests to /api/adaptive/next-activity
5. Test recommendation acceptance via /api/adaptive/recommendations/{id}/action
6. Verify API error handling for failed requests
7. Check console warnings for API failures
8. Test API integration updates UI properly

description: Verify dashboard page requires user authentication and redirects unauthenticated users
scenario: Unauthenticated user attempts to access dashboard page
expected_results: Redirect unauthenticated users to login page with appropriate message
procedure:
1. Ensure user is logged out
2. Navigate directly to http://localhost:5000/profile/dashboard
3. Verify redirect to login page
4. Check authentication required message or behavior
5. Login with valid credentials
6. Verify successful access to dashboard page
7. Test session timeout scenario
8. Check redirect preservation after login

description: Verify proper handling when database is disabled (Vercel environment)
scenario: User attempts to access dashboard in deployment environment with disabled database
expected_results: Display warning message about dashboard unavailability and redirect to home
procedure:
1. Set DISABLE_DATABASE config to True
2. Navigate to /profile/dashboard page while logged in
3. Verify warning message 'User dashboard is not available in this deployment environment.'
4. Check redirect to home page
5. Verify no dashboard content is displayed
6. Test user experience with clear messaging
7. Check no database operations are attempted
8. Verify graceful fallback behavior

description: Verify learning recommendation interaction and acceptance functionality
scenario: User interacts with learning recommendations and accepts suggestions
expected_results: Recommendation acceptance updates UI and makes API calls correctly
procedure:
1. Navigate to dashboard with learning recommendations
2. Click 'Accept' button on a recommendation
3. Verify AJAX POST to /api/adaptive/recommendations/{id}/action
4. Check recommendation UI updates to show accepted state
5. Verify recommendation opacity changes to 0.5
6. Check success message displays in recommendation card
7. Test error handling for failed API calls
8. Verify JavaScript acceptRecommendation() function works

description: Verify next activity suggestions load and display correctly
scenario: Dashboard loads personalized next activity suggestions from adaptive learning engine
expected_results: Next activity suggestions display with proper formatting and navigation links
procedure:
1. Navigate to dashboard page
2. Verify loadAdaptiveLearningData() function executes
3. Check AJAX request to /api/adaptive/next-activity
4. Verify next activity suggestion updates UI
5. Check suggestion displays type, reason, and action button
6. Test simulation suggestions link to correct level
7. Verify Blue Team suggestions link to Blue Team mode
8. Check suggestion container updates properly

description: Verify dashboard sections animate correctly on page load
scenario: User observes dashboard sections appearing with staggered animations
expected_results: Dashboard sections appear in sequence with proper fade-in animations
procedure:
1. Navigate to dashboard page (clear cache first)
2. Observe animation sequence on page load
3. Verify header animates first (animate-fade-in-up)
4. Check stats cards animate with 0.1s-0.4s delays
5. Verify progress section animates with 0.5s delay
6. Check quick actions animate with 0.6s delay
7. Verify recommendations and skills animate with 0.7s-0.8s delays
8. Check analytics section animates with 0.9s delay
9. Test animation performance and smoothness

description: Verify dashboard displays correctly in dark mode
scenario: User toggles dark mode and uses dashboard page
expected_results: All elements display properly with dark theme colors and proper contrast
procedure:
1. Navigate to dashboard page
2. Toggle dark mode using theme switcher
3. Verify background gradient changes to dark theme (dark:from-gray-900 dark:to-gray-800)
4. Check card backgrounds use dark theme (dark:bg-gray-800)
5. Verify text colors invert properly (dark:text-white)
6. Test stat card icon backgrounds in dark mode
7. Check progress bars and recommendation cards styling
8. Verify border colors adapt (dark:border-gray-700)
9. Test accessibility and contrast ratios

description: Verify dashboard is responsive across different screen sizes
scenario: User accesses dashboard on mobile, tablet, and desktop devices
expected_results: Dashboard adapts properly to different screen sizes while maintaining functionality
procedure:
1. Navigate to dashboard on desktop (1920x1080)
2. Verify max-width constraint (max-w-7xl) and grid layouts
3. Resize browser to tablet size (768px width)
4. Check stats grid changes (grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4)
5. Verify progress section layout (lg:col-span-2)
6. Resize to mobile size (375px width)
7. Check header layout adapts (flex-col sm:flex-row)
8. Test level grid responsiveness (grid-cols-2 sm:grid-cols-5)
9. Verify analytics grid adapts (grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3)
10. Test landscape and portrait orientations

description: Verify dashboard data refreshes and updates correctly
scenario: Dashboard data updates when user completes activities or learning patterns change
expected_results: Dashboard reflects current user progress and updates dynamically
procedure:
1. Note current dashboard metrics
2. Complete a cybersecurity level in another tab
3. Return to dashboard and refresh page
4. Verify updated progress metrics
5. Check level completion status updates
6. Test skill assessment updates
7. Verify XP and streak updates
8. Check automatic data refresh (5-minute interval)
9. Test real-time data synchronization

description: Verify dashboard handles empty states gracefully for new users
scenario: New user with no progress views dashboard with appropriate empty state messages
expected_results: Dashboard shows helpful empty states with guidance for getting started
procedure:
1. Create new user account with no progress
2. Navigate to dashboard page
3. Verify stats show zero values appropriately
4. Check recommendations empty state with robot icon
5. Verify skills empty state with bar-chart icon
6. Check helpful messages guide user to start learning
7. Test empty state styling and layout
8. Verify all empty states provide clear next steps

description: Verify dashboard navigation links work correctly and maintain context
scenario: User navigates from dashboard to various sections and returns with preserved context
expected_results: All navigation links work correctly and user context is maintained
procedure:
1. Navigate to dashboard page
2. Click 'Continue Next Level' button (if available)
3. Verify navigation to correct level start page
4. Use browser back to return to dashboard
5. Click 'View All Levels' link
6. Verify navigation to levels overview
7. Test 'View Profile' link navigation
8. Check recommendation action links work correctly
9. Verify user context preservation throughout navigation

description: Verify dashboard page loads efficiently with optimal performance
scenario: User accesses dashboard and expects fast loading times with all data
expected_results: Dashboard loads within acceptable time limits with all styling and functionality
procedure:
1. Clear browser cache
2. Open browser developer tools Performance tab
3. Navigate to dashboard page
4. Record page load time and performance metrics
5. Verify total load time is under 3 seconds
6. Check First Contentful Paint (FCP) is under 1.5 seconds
7. Verify Largest Contentful Paint (LCP) is acceptable
8. Test page load on slower network connections
9. Check for render-blocking resources
10. Verify animations don't impact performance significantly
11. Test API call performance for adaptive learning data

description: Verify dashboard handles errors gracefully when data cannot be loaded
scenario: Dashboard encounters errors loading progress data or API failures
expected_results: Graceful error handling with fallback displays and user feedback
procedure:
1. Simulate database connection issues
2. Navigate to dashboard page
3. Verify appropriate error handling for missing progress data
4. Test API error handling for adaptive learning endpoints
5. Check fallback displays for failed data loads
6. Verify error logging for debugging
7. Test partial data load scenarios
8. Check user experience with clear error messaging
9. Test system recovery when connections are restored

description: Verify dashboard only displays data for authenticated user with proper security
scenario: Dashboard shows only current user's data and maintains privacy
expected_results: User can only view their own progress data with proper security isolation
procedure:
1. Login with User A credentials
2. Note User A's dashboard data
3. Logout and login with User B credentials
4. Verify User B sees only their own data
5. Check no data leakage between users
6. Test direct URL manipulation attempts
7. Verify session security prevents unauthorized access
8. Check adaptive learning data isolation
9. Test recommendation privacy

description: Verify dashboard CSS assets load correctly and styling is applied
scenario: Dashboard loads with proper styling from CSS files
expected_results: All CSS assets load correctly and dashboard displays with intended styling
procedure:
1. Navigate to dashboard page
2. Verify dashboard.css loads successfully
3. Check base styles are applied correctly
4. Test custom dashboard styling overrides
5. Verify gradient backgrounds render correctly
6. Check responsive CSS media queries work
7. Test CSS Grid and Flexbox layouts
8. Verify CSS asset caching and performance

description: Verify JavaScript components handle errors gracefully
scenario: Dashboard JavaScript encounters errors and provides graceful degradation
expected_results: JavaScript errors don't break dashboard functionality
procedure:
1. Navigate to dashboard page
2. Open browser developer tools Console tab
3. Verify no JavaScript errors on page load
4. Test adaptive learning API error scenarios
5. Check error handling for failed AJAX requests
6. Verify dashboard functions without JavaScript if needed
7. Test progress bar animation error handling
8. Check recommendation interaction error handling
9. Verify graceful degradation for all features

description: Verify dashboard meets accessibility standards (WCAG)
scenario: User with disabilities accesses dashboard using assistive technologies
expected_results: Dashboard is fully accessible with proper labels, ARIA attributes, and keyboard navigation
procedure:
1. Navigate to dashboard page
2. Test keyboard navigation through all interactive elements
3. Verify tab order is logical
4. Check all buttons and links have proper labels
5. Test dashboard with screen reader software
6. Verify focus indicators are visible and clear
7. Check color contrast ratios meet WCAG AA standards
8. Test progress bars are accessible to screen readers
9. Verify section headings provide proper structure
10. Check ARIA landmarks and roles are properly used
11. Test recommendation interactions are keyboard accessible

description: Verify dashboard system meets security best practices and compliance requirements
scenario: Security audit of dashboard functionality and data handling
expected_results: Dashboard follows security best practices and prevents common vulnerabilities
procedure:
1. Audit authentication requirements for dashboard access
2. Verify user data isolation and privacy
3. Check protection against data enumeration
4. Test for injection vulnerabilities in progress display
5. Verify proper API authentication for adaptive learning endpoints
6. Check session management security
7. Test for information disclosure vulnerabilities
8. Verify proper error handling doesn't leak information
9. Check logging for security events
10. Verify compliance with security frameworks (OWASP)
11. Test dashboard against common attack vectors
12. Verify secure communication (HTTPS enforcement)
13. Check adaptive learning API security
14. Verify data encryption and storage security
